числовое дополнение ко времени, сроку
rtega_mnemonic:
屆屆RS
届届		a numerary adjunct for periodic terms or events, expire, reach, arrive, deliver
  • corpses 尸 of plants (seeds) in dirt 凷 which shoot in spring time 由: periodic event arriving at the same time each year, the seeds need to be delivered to the farmer before he can plant them

heisig_chinese_memo: The fall due to drunkness landed the soldier in a pit, but lucky he was saved by a pile of flags.
Ru_trainchinese: jiè: (сч.слово) созыв, выпуск, счетное слово для событий, встреч, выборов, спортивных мероприятий и т.д.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the US, when the mail is delivered, a flag sprouts up on your mailbox. The flag will fall due to the automatic sensor when you get the mail.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " corpse ", the sound of "凷". The original meaning is inconvenience. "Said Wen": "It's inconvenient when you are here. One said: Extremely. From the corpse, the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "This is similar to the meaning of the scorpion. It is impossible to sail on the sand." Zhang Shunhui "Explanation of Words": "Anyone who is inconvenient means that the behavior is obstructed and cannot move forward. It is the man who is in the boat, and the matter is one ear. The word cannot be moved, so the word has the ultimate meaning, which means that there is a stop Also." For example, "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Jie Nanshan": "The gentleman is like a good man, and the people are disappointed." Yu Yueping discussed: "If the gentleman's actions are not convenient for the people, the relationship between the top and the bottom will be blocked and the hearts of the people will be closed."

" Ten " means the limit and the end. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "The term, the extreme." Guo Pu's Note: "There are limits to the extreme." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Zhanzheng": "The thief is sick, and the barbarian is stricken." Zheng Xuanjian: "The thief is also extremely." " Fan " and " thief " are pests.

" Session " means to and to. Such as "Shang Shu. "Da Yumo": "Only virtue moves the sky, without distance." Kong Chuan: "The term, the ultimate." "Selected Works. "Cao Zijian "Seven Qi"": "Into the wilderness of Yangtze, then the house of Xuanweizi."

" Session " can be used as a quantifier, which is equivalent to " time " and " period ". Such as Xu Ke "Qing Barnyard Banknotes. Exam class. Ni Enling: "Senior Scholars in Front of the Field": "Xianfeng Geng's Candidates were less than half of the previous exams. They were harassed by the Cantonese invaders. The provinces were in trouble, and they were unable to do so." Mao Dun "Send the exam": "Then she told the school How many registrations are made for this year’s exams and how strict they are."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " corpse ", the sound of "凷". The original meaning is inconvenience.
humanum_full_description:
從「尸」，「凷」聲。本義是行動不便。《說文》：「屆，行不便也。一曰：極也。从尸，凷聲。」段玉裁注：「此與艐義相近。艐，船著沙不行也。」張舜徽《說文解字約注》：「行不便者，謂行為物阻，不得前進也。在人為屆，在舟為艐，其事一耳。行不得進，故屆字又有極義，謂有所止也。」例如《詩．小雅．節南山》：「君子如屆，俾民心闋。」俞樾平議：「言君子所行如不便於民，則上下之情不通而民之心閉矣。」

　　「屆」表示極限、盡。《爾雅．釋言》：「屆，極也。」郭璞注：「有所限極。」如《詩．大雅．瞻卬》：「蟊賊蟊疾，靡有夷屆。」鄭玄箋：「屆，極也。」「蟊」和「賊」是害蟲。

　　「屆」表示至、到。如《尚書．大禹謨》：「惟德動天，無遠弗屆。」孔傳：「屆，至也。」《文選．曹子建〈七啟〉》：「入乎泱漭之野，遂屆玄微子之所居。」

　　「屆」可作量詞，相當於「次」、「期」。如徐珂《清稗類鈔．考試類．倪恩齡場前中進士》：「咸豐庚申會試，應試者不及歷屆之半，以粵寇肆擾，各省亂事未已，無力成行也。」茅盾〈送考〉：「接着她就訴說這學校每屆考試報名的如何多，取的如何嚴格。」
humanum_short_description: 從「尸」，「凷」聲。本義是行動不便。

Main pronunciation 主要发音: jiè

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning (orig) an uneven road.

English senses 英语理解: numerary adjunct for time, term

Usage example 用法举例: 屆時 jiè shí (at the appointed time)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1857

Chinese: The fall due to drunkness landed the soldier in a pit, but lucky he was saved by a pile of flags.
Meaning: fall due
Hanzi: 届
Story: In the US, when the mail is delivered, a flag sprouts up on your mailbox. The flag will fall due to the automatic sensor when you get the mail.
Kind: traditional

從「 尸 」，「 凷 」聲。本義是行動不便。《說文》：「屆，行不便也。一曰：極也。从尸，凷聲。」段玉裁注：「此與艐義相近。艐，船著沙不行也。」張舜徽《說文解字約注》：「行不便者，謂行為物阻，不得前進也。在人為屆，在舟為艐，其事一耳。行不得進，故屆字又有極義，謂有所止也。」例如《詩．小雅．節南山》：「君子如屆，俾民心闋。」俞樾平議：「言君子所行如不便於民，則上下之情不通而民之心閉矣。」 「 屆 」表示極限、盡。《爾雅．釋言》：「屆，極也。」郭璞注：「有所限極。」如《詩．大雅．瞻卬》：「蟊賊蟊疾，靡有夷屆。」鄭玄箋：「屆，極也。」「 蟊 」和「 賊 」是害蟲。 「 屆 」表示至、到。如《尚書．大禹謨》：「惟德動天，無遠弗屆。」孔傳：「屆，至也。」《文選．曹子建〈七啟〉》：「入乎泱漭之野，遂屆玄微子之所居。」 「 屆 」可作量詞，相當於「 次 」、「 期 」。如徐珂《清稗類鈔．考試類．倪恩齡場前中進士》：「咸豐庚申會試，應試者不及歷屆之半，以粵寇肆擾，各省亂事未已，無力成行也。」茅盾〈送考〉：「接着她就訴說這學校每屆考試報名的如何多，取的如何嚴格。」
